name: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania v. Kenneth TEATER, Appellant

judges: Before O’BRIEN, C. J., and ROBERTS, NIX, LARSEN, FLAHERTY and KAUFFMAN, JJ.
parties: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania v. Kenneth TEATER, Appellant.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM:
Judgment of Sentence of the Court of Common Pleas of Philadelphia County is affirmed.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM:

attorneys: Norris E. Gelman, Philadelphia, for appellant.
Robert B. Lawler, Chief, Appeals Div., Asst. Dist. Atty., Ellen Mattleman, Philadelphia, for appellee.
casebody.head_matter:
424 A.2d 498
COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania v. Kenneth TEATER, Appellant.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Argued Oct. 16, 1980.
Decided Jan. 27, 1981.
Norris E. Gelman, Philadelphia, for appellant.
Robert B. Lawler, Chief, Appeals Div., Asst. Dist. Atty., Ellen Mattleman, Philadelphia, for appellee.
Before O’BRIEN, C. J., and ROBERTS, NIX, LARSEN, FLAHERTY and KAUFFMAN, JJ.
